Cell.Data: The DEV TEAM / MISC NOTES column contains info on what text between { } signs means (if applicable). It usually stands for either a numeric value, or a numeric value with an icon. Text between [ ] signs stands for a certain type of icon.

In the text below, text refers to a person that can either be male or female. If relevant for translation, please use the ‘localized string’ column for the male text and the ‘alternative localized string’ column for the female text.

The standard-issue pack you received after basic training.[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Volt Pike[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Entropy Revolver[/AbilityGreen] that deals [DamageEntropy/] Entropy damage.
Volt Pike and Volt Pistol are Oathbound weapons

The pack you received after Close Combat training.[br/][br/]This advanced training gives you the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - increases your maximum [hp/].[br/][br/]The pack includes:[br/][AbilityGreen]Volt Pike[/AbilityGreen] that deals repeated [DamageWave/] Arc damage at close range.[br/]An [AbilityGreen]Static Bomb[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [DamageWave/] Arc Damage in a 1 hex radius.

Text between {} should NOT be localized as they are numerical values in-game. Text between [] should NOT be localized as they are either icons or text formatting
EXAMPLE: "Hero gains {PersonaAccDmg} increased damage and accuracy " looks in-game like "Hero gains +5 increased damage and accuracy"

The [AbilityGreen]Protector[/AbilityGreen] is a melee-focused battlesuit vehicle made specifically to protect its allies.[br/][br/]You have the following skill:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Protector[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful melee [Damagewavel/] Arc capabilities.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Volt Pistol[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [Damagewave/] Arc damage to a single target.
Protector is an Oatbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Warden[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle dedicated to medium-ranged attacks and support.[br/][br/]You have the following skill:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Warden[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful ranged [Damagewave/] Arc capabilities.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Static Bomb[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [DamageWave/] Arc Damage in a 1 hex radius.
Warden is an Oathbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Warlord[/AbilityGreen] is a mobile, melee-focused battlesuit vehicle given to you for your display of skill in combat.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarter Specialist I[/AbilityGreen] - increases damage dealt when using Melee Weapons.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]Your [AbilityGreen]Warlord[/AbilityGreen], which possesses powerful [DamageWave/] Arc and movement capabilities.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Volt Pistol[/AbilityGreen], that when used causes [Damagewave/] Arc damage to a single target.
Warlord is an Oathbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Marquis[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle specialized in backline support.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] hit points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Marquis[/AbilityGreen] with various support abilities.[br/]The [AbilityGreen]Watcher's Scrolls[/AbilityGreen], granting [abilityblue]Gift of Providence.[/abilityblue]
Marquis is an Oathbound vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Light Bringer[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle based on a Paladin Warden. It has Celestian ranged attacks.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Vitality I[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your maximum [hp/] hit points.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Light Bringer[/AbilityGreen] with a ranged attack and a banner spreading [abilityred]Soulburn[/abilityred] and [abilityred]Burning[/abilityred] plus a [AbilityGreen]Mod[/AbilityGreen][br/]An [AbilityGreen]Entropic Revolver[/AbilityGreen], a pistol dealing [damageentropy/] damage.
Light Bringer is an Oathbound Celestian vehicle unit

The [AbilityGreen]Purifier[/AbilityGreen] is a battlesuit vehicle based on the Warlord. It has Thermal attacks.[br/][br/]You have the following skills:[br/][AbilityGreen]Piloting[/AbilityGreen] - enables the Commander to ride basic vehicles and mounts.[br/][AbilityGreen]Close Quarters Specialization I[/AbilityGreen] - greatly increases your melee damage.[br/][br/]The loadout includes:[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Purifier[/AbilityGreen] vehicle with a multi-target melee attack and an artillery attack.[br/]A [AbilityGreen]Entropic Revolver[/AbilityGreen], a pistol dealing [damageentropy/] damage.
Purifier is an Oathbound Promethean vehicle unit
